wikipedia_page.main: David Brazier is a British author and psychotherapist known for his writings on psychotherapy and Zen Buddhism. He is a Pureland Buddhist devoted to Amida Buddha. He is the founder of the Amida Order and retired end 2020 from the Amida Order. He leads now the Global Sangha. Brazier describes himself as a "Buddhist priest, psychotherapist, social worker, and poet."
